name: Sacrificial Greatsword

refinement_effect.refine_one: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.
refinement_effect.refine_two: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 50% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 26s.
refinement_effect.refine_three: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 60% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 22s.
refinement_effect.refine_four: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 70% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 18s.
refinement_effect.refine_five: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 14s.

description: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.
